name: Zero Baby
description:
A child was born with an anomaly. He is a zero gravity baby.

Doctors take your baby to observation urgently. Later, they give you the worst news that a mother could receive, "your son has died". They don't let you see him again. Months later you receive a mysterious call. "He is still alive, they are doing experiments with him". 

You are in the experimentation laboratories right now. Your goal is clear, find your baby, run away and watch him grow.
